information.name: towercoverage
information.description: A simple UCRM Plugin to receive push data from TowerCoverage.com.
information.author: Ryan Spaeth <rspaeth@mvqn.net>

configuration.label: Verbose Debugging?
configuration.description: If enabled, will include verbose debug messages in the Webhook Request Body.

configuration.label: API Key
configuration.description: The API Key from TowerCoverage.com. If blank, allows submissions from any EUS API.

configuration.label: API Username
configuration.description: The API Username from TowerCoverage.com. If blank, allows submissions from any EUS API.

configuration.label: API Password
configuration.description: The API Password from TowerCoverage.com. If blank, allows submissions from any EUS API.

configuration.label: Duplicate Mode
configuration.description: Select the method for determining duplicate entries.
